TopicTitle: How do I get a profile picture? Also what are the green bars and ranks?

Articles.Content: Hello I've never really been on the forums so im new, I wanted to see how you get a picture, and also to get more bars and a higher rank. Thanks!:)

You can set your Avatar, Profile Picture (different things), and Signature in the "Settings" tab at the top right of the menu. Avatar is what displays on posts, Profile Picture is what displays when someone looks at your profile.

The green bar is reputation, and it's only earned when people share it with you. You share reputation with others by clicking on the black star-shaped button in the lower left of each post.

Hope this helps.
